participant_1.background:
I love my dog so much.
I wear comfy clothes when I'm at home, so I can relax and feel free.
My spouse is my manager and helps me with my career as a lead singer.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals.

participant_2.background:
If they can't get along with my pets, I can't get along with them.
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.
I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, casual clothing that lets me move freely while I play music and write stories.
My sunflowers are beautiful and I am proud of them.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing great! I'm just hanging out and watching some old movies.
That sounds like a fun way to spend a day! What kind of movies are you watching?
I'm watching some old Disney movies from my childhood.
I love Disney movies! They're so nostalgic.
Me too! I have a huge collection of them.
That's awesome! I only have a few, but I love them all.
What's your favorite Disney movie?
It's so hard to choose! I think I'd have to say The Lion King.
That's a great choice! It's one of my favorites too.
What's your favorite song from the movie?
I love "Hakuna Matata." It's so catchy and fun.
Me too! It's one of my go-to songs when I'm feeling down.
It's always a good mood booster.
Do you have any other hobbies besides watching movies?
I also like to play music and write stories.
That's awesome! I love to play music too.
What do you play?
I play the guitar and the piano.
Nice! I play the guitar and the ukulele.
That's awesome! We should jam together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to
